channel.title: Events on Czech and Slovak Students in Zurich

item.title: Grill Welcome Event!
item.description: At the end of April, the Czech and Slovak Students in Zurich association was officially founded. To celebrate this occasion, we are going to be grilling at KÃ¤ferberg! Come to meet Czech and Slovak students and get to know the association itself. We plan to grill, have a bonfire and sing not only Czech and Slovak songs (guitar included).
